title: Materials & finishes

materials.name: Desktop Surface
materials.desc: High-pressure laminate (HPL) on 25mm moisture-resistant particleboard core. Scratch-resistant, easy to clean, ABS edge banding 2mm.

materials.name: Steel Frame
materials.desc: Cold-rolled steel profiles, powder-coated finish in RAL colours. Anti-corrosion treated. Column profiles: 70×70mm rectangular tube.

materials.name: Feet & Levellers
materials.desc: Die-cast zinc alloy feet with felt pads for floor protection. Adjustable levellers ±15mm for uneven floors.
